trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for the Windows Forms application model.
trans-unit.target: Windows Forms 응용 프로그램 모델에 대 한 동기화 컨텍스트를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed when a control is created.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> 는 컨트롤을 만들 때 설치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The AutoInstall property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is installed when a control is created, or when a message loop is started.
trans-unit.target: 자동 설치 속성에 따라 결정 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>는 컨트롤을 만들 때 또는 메시지 루프가 시작 될 때 설치 된.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> 설치 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 동기화 컨텍스트를 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 동기화 컨텍스트의 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면 Dispose를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>불안정 한 상태가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출한 후에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>차지한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에 항상 호출 삭제

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 메시지를 동기화 컨텍스트로 디스패치합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Post method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: Post 메서드는 메시지를 게시 하는 비동기 요청을 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>호출할 대리자입니다.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자에 전달 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context
trans-unit.target: 동기 메시지를 동기화 컨텍스트로 디스패치합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the destination thread no longer exists or the value of its <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the Send method raises an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.
trans-unit.target: 대상 스레드가 더 이상 존재 하는 경우 또는 값을 해당 <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 `false`, Send 메서드가 발생 <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the caller to determine what further action to take.
trans-unit.target: 호출자가 수행 하는 추가 작업을 결정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>호출할 대리자입니다.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자에 전달 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The destination thread no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: 대상 스레드가 더 이상 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the currently installed <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> and replaces it with the previously installed context.
trans-unit.target: 현재 설치 된 제거 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> 이전에 설치 된 컨텍스트도 대체 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the previously installed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is `null`, the current context is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 이전에 설치한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>은 `null`, 현재 컨텍스트가로 설정 되어 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If the currently installed synchronization context is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 현재 설치 된 동기화 컨텍스트가 하지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>,이 메서드는 아무 작업도 수행 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>
